translations: 证明，证实；展示（才能）；表露（感情）；公众游行（demonstrate 的过去式与过去分词）

sentences.sentence: It has been demonstrated that this drug is effective.
Catherine demonstrated the proper way to cleanse the face.
sentences.translation: 凯瑟琳演示了洁面的正确方法。

sentences.sentence: He demonstrated the all-round skills of a quarterback.
sentences.translation: 他展示了一个四分卫的全面技能。
